data.name: Tech Cruise
data.description: Tech Cruise 2020 takes place May 23rd to 28th, 2020 onboard the Royal Caribbean ‘Grandeur of the Seas’ Cruise Ship departing Orlando (Port Canaveral), Florida, sailing to CocoCay (Bahamas), King’s Wharf (Bermuda), then back. relatedRecords.name: CFS  - Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest: Big Data & Analytics Conference
relatedRecords.description:
Hello Everyone!
We are pleased to announce that registration is open for “Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest”, a 1-day event on Friday, April 17, 2020, 9:00AM to 5:00PM at the Microsoft offices at 12012 Sunset Hills Road, Reston,VA., 20190. We will be in Rooms 3028, 3054, 3058, and 3062.
